skins.name: Carlotta
skins.attributes_description: Used to unlock a Resonator-specific outfit that grants the designated Resonator a new look.
skins.description: Soft satin smoothly flows down from her body. The droplets on her glisten like luxurious gems. As they dip into the water, ripples spread across the pool into you and the girl's heart.

skins.name: Carlotta
skins.description: A boldly designed one-piece dress. Red is Carlotta's color. She wears it even on secret missions, in the dead of night, when stealth is crucial. She is a nonconformist and trendsetter.

157.name: Beauty Blazes Brightest Before It Fades
157.description: When Carlotta deals DMG to a target inflicted with <color=Highlight><te href=850019>Deconstruction</te></color>, the Crit. Rate of this instance of DMG is increased by {1}. When Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Chromatic Splendor</color> hits a target inflicted with <color=Highlight><te href=850020>Dispersion</te></color>, Carlotta additionally restores {3} points of Substance.

158.name: Fallen Petals Give Life to New Blooms
158.description: The DMG Multiplier of Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Fatal Finale</color> is increased by {0}.

159.name: Adelante, Cortado, Spinning in Grace
159.description: Enable Outro Skill <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscope Sparks</color>: Deal 1 additional strike at the end of Outro Skill <color=Highlight>Closing Remark</color>, dealing Glacio DMG equal to {0} of Carlotta's ATK. The DMG Multiplier of Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Art of Violence</color> and Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Chromatic Splendor</color> is increased by {1}.

160.name: Yesterday's Raindrops Make Finest Wine
160.description: Casting Heavy Attack, Heavy Attack <color=Highlight>Containment Tactics</color>, and Heavy Attack <color=Highlight>Imminent Oblivion</color> grants all Resonators in the team {0} Resonance Skill DMG Bonus for {1}s.

161.name: Toast to Past, Today, and Every Day to Come
161.description: The DMG Multiplier of Heavy Attack <color=Highlight>Imminent Oblivion</color> is increased by {0}.

162.name: As the Curtain Falls, I Remain What I Am
162.description:
Shots of Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Death Knell</color> deal higher DMG and shoot out double the number of crystal shards, representing a total increase of {0} in the DMG Multiplier of Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Death Knell</color>.
Shots of Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Death Knell</color> inflict <color=Highlight>Scattering</color> on targets when hit, during which the target is immobilized. This effect is removed after {2}s or when the target receives DMG.

params.name: Silent Execution
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack</color></size>
Perform up to 2 consecutive strikes, dealing <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack - Necessary Measures</color></size>
With <te href=850017>Moldable Crystals</te>, Carlotta's <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> is replaced with <color=Highlight>Necessary Measures</color>.
Chain up to 3 strikes, dealing <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color>. Each strike of <color=Highlight>Necessary Measures</color> consumes <SapTag=1>{1}</SapTag> Moldable {Cus:Sap,S=Crystal P=Crystals SapTag=1}.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Heavy Attack</color></size>
Deliver a charged attack at the target at the cost of STA, dealing <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Heavy Attack - Containment Tactics</color></size>
When Carlotta's <te href=850018>Substance</te> is full, her <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack</color> will be replaced with <color=Highlight>Containment Tactics</color>: consume all Substance to deal <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color> and reduce the cooldown of Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Art of Violence</color> by {3}s.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Mid-air Attack</color></size>
Perform a Plunging Attack at the cost of STA, dealing <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color>. Using <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> shortly after the landing will cast <color=Highlight>Customary Greetings</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Mid-air Attack - Customary Greetings</color></size>
Flip over the target and deliver a surprise shot, dealing <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Dodge Counter</color></size>
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> shortly after a successful <color=Highlight>Dodge</color> to deliver a riposte shot, dealing <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color>. This consumes <SapTag=6>{6}</SapTag> Moldable {Cus:Sap,S=Crystal P=Crystals SapTag=6}.

params.name: Art of Violence
params.description:
Deal <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color> and inflict <color=Highlight>Dispersion</color> on the target. {Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> again shortly after to cast <color=Highlight>Chromatic Splendor</color>. 
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Dispersion</color></size>
Targets with Dispersion are immobilized for {1}s. 
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Chromatic Splendor</color></size>
Consume all <te href=850017>Moldable Crystals</te> and deal <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color>.
The Resonance Skill enters cooldown after a while if <color=Highlight>Chromatic Splendor</color> is not cast or Carlotta is switched off the field.

params.name: Era of New Wave
params.description:
Deal <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color> to all targets in an area (considered Resonance Skill DMG) and inflict <color=Highlight>Deconstruction</color> on targets hit, then activate <color=Highlight>Twilight Tango</color>.
Can be cast in mid-air close to the ground.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Deconstruction</color></size>
Dealing DMG to targets inflicted with <color=Highlight>Deconstruction</color> ignores {1} of their DEF.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Twilight Tango</color></size>
While in <color=Highlight>Twilight Tango</color>, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> or <color=Highlight>Resonance Liberation</color> to cast <color=Highlight>Death Knell</color>.
Each <color=Highlight>Death Knell</color> grants <SapTag=3>{3}</SapTag> Meta {Cus:Sap,S=Vector P=Vectors SapTag=3}.
With {4} Meta Vectors, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> or <color=Highlight>Resonance Liberation</color> to cast <color=Highlight>Fatal Finale</color>. 
- All Substance is removed when activating and ending <color=Highlight>Twilight Tango</color>. Cannot perform Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Necessary Measures</color>, Heavy Attack <color=Highlight>Containment Tactics</color>, and Heavy Attack <color=Highlight>Imminent Oblivion</color> while in <color=Highlight>Twilight Tango</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Death Knell</color></size>
Carlotta fires powerful shots with her musket and summons {5} crystal shards to attack the target, dealing <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color>, considered Resonance Skill DMG.
- Carlotta moves in the direction of the movement input with each shot of <color=Highlight>Death Knell</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Fatal Finale</color></size>
Deal <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color> to an area, considered Resonance Skill DMG.
- <color=Highlight>Twilight Tango</color> ends after casting <color=Highlight>Fatal Finale</color>.

params.name: Flawless Purity
params.description:
After casting Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Chromatic Splendor</color>, Carlotta can perform <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attacks</color> while being immune to any DMG or interruptions before the Mid-air Attack deals DMG.
When Carlotta is on the team, the active Resonator's Flight STA cost is reduced by {0}.

params.name: Ars Gratia Artis
params.description: Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Wintertime Aria</color>, Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Chromatic Splendor</color>, Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Death Knell</color>, and Heavy Attack <color=Highlight>Imminent Oblivion</color> can inflict <color=Highlight><te href=850019>Deconstruction</te></color>.

params.name: Lethal Repertoire
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Heavy Attack - Imminent Oblivion</color></size>
Carlotta activates <color=Highlight>Tinted Crystal</color> every {0}s.
When Substance is full and <color=Highlight>Tinted Crystal</color> is activated, hold <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> to consume all Substance and cast Heavy Attack <color=Highlight>Imminent Oblivion</color>, after which <color=Highlight>Tinted Crystal</color> enters cooldown. 
Deal <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color> (considered Resonance Skill DMG), and reduce the cooldown of Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Art of Violence</color> by {1}s.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Final Bow</color></size>
When Substance is full, enter the <color=Highlight>Final Bow</color> state.
Increase the DMG Multiplier of Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Era of New Wave</color>, Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Death Knell</color>, and Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Fatal Finale</color> by {14}. This effect ends when Carlotta is switched off the field during <color=Highlight>Twilight Tango</color> or when <color=Highlight>Twilight Tango</color> ends.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Substance</color></size>
Carlotta can hold up to {2} points of Substance.
Cannot gain Substance while in <color=Highlight>Twilight Tango</color> triggered by Resonance Liberation.
Restore {3} points of Substance upon casting Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Wintertime Aria</color>.
Restore {5} points of Substance for every {4} Moldable Crystal consumed upon casting Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Chromatic Splendor</color>.
Restore {5} points of Substance for every {4} Moldable Crystal consumed upon casting Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Necessary Measures</color>.
Consume {4} Moldable Crystal and restore {12} points of Substance upon casting <color=Highlight>Dodge Counter</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Moldable Crystal</color></size>
Carlotta can hold up to {6} Moldable Crystals.
Cannot gain Moldable Crystal while in <color=Highlight>Twilight Tango</color> triggered by Resonance Liberation.
Restore {7} Moldable Crystals upon casting <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 2</color>.
Restore {11} Moldable Crystals upon casting <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack</color>.
Restore {8} Moldable Crystals upon casting Mid-air Attack <color=Highlight>Customary Greetings</color>.
Restore {13} Moldable Crystals upon casting Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Wintertime Aria</color>.
Restore {9} Moldable Crystals upon casting Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Art of Violence</color>.
Restore {10} Moldable Crystals upon a successful <color=Highlight>Dodge</color>.

params.name: Closing Remark
params.description: Attack the target, dealing <color=Ice>Glacio DMG</color> equal to {0} of Carlotta's ATK.

params.name: Tune Break: Pistols
params.description: When the target's <color=Highlight>Off-Tune Level</color> is full, the Resonator may cast <color=Highlight><te href=100001>Tune Break</te></color> on the target.
